bibl.title: Ismant el-Kharab: An Elite Roman Period Residence.
bibl.note: Describes the results of recent excavation of a large, elaborately-decorated residence at Ismant el-Kharab in the Dakhla Oasis. Tetrastyle atrium house (designated B/3/1), second century (used into the late third or fourth century, ultimately as an animal stable).
bibl.seg: HOPE Colin, Ismant el-Kharab: An Elite Roman Period Residence.
Egyptian Archaeology 34 (2009) pp. 20-24, 1 plan, 10 figg. coul.

Describes the results of recent excavation of a large, elaborately-decorated residence at Ismant el-Kharab in the Dakhla Oasis. Tetrastyle atrium house (designated B/3/1), second century (used into the late third or fourth century, ultimately as an animal stable).
